entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -10.7°C

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 60 %
